newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Australia's ACCC says looking at Australis.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Australia's ACCC says looking at Australis.

text.p: Australia's competition regulatory agency, The Australian Competition and Consumer Commission (ACCC), said it will proceed to assess the trade practices law implications of plans for a group of investors to inject equity finance into pay-tv operator Australis Media Ltd.
The ACCC said it had not yet reached a view on the joint venture agreement announced on Tuesday.
"Meetings have been arranged with the principle parties to the arrangements over the next few days," ACCC chairman Alan Fells said in a statement.
"The commission at this stage has not formed a view on the joint venture agreement and will need to examine all details of the arrangements before doing so," Fells said.
